entry.title: How To Build A Simple Blog With Hugo
entry.content:
What is Hugo and why

Hugo vs others

Install Hugo

Please refer this hugo official document to install hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/
If you are using mac, it is quite simple, lets install hugo!!!

Mac OS

brew install hugo
hugo new site blog
cd blog
git init

Add theme

There are so many theme from hugo page, you can select for your own like personal blog, you can go to document of each page to know how to use and config the theme

In this my blog i am using this theme https://www.axiomtheme.com/docs/quick-start/
Back to parent of your directory and add submodule for your project

# if you in blog project 
cd ..  
git submodule add https://github.com/marketempower/axiom.git themes/axiom

Add new content

create a new post

hugo new posts/my-first-post.md

add content to post

---
title: "My First Post"
date: 2019-03-26T08:47:11+01:00
draft: true
---

Run app and working in developent mode

start server

hugo server -D

check view

open browser with url
http://localhost:1313/

Before we have create a new post with name my-first-post now we can check with new page
http://localhost:1313/posts/my-first-post

Deploy to github page

Create 2 repositories

  1. For hugo source code
    You will code and modify in this repository
  2. For generate static file, only for deploy
